item.title: Ansible
item.description:
Terraform, Azure, Ansible & Windows

Config management has been something on the back of my mind to dive into but have never quite got around to it, so its about time to have a look at ansible! The is to to provision & configure a Windows VM without having to touch a GUI

1. Deploy the VM

Firstly we need to deploy a VM to Azure, for this i’m just using the example code provided with the azurerm_windows_virtual_machine with the addition of a Public IP to manage remotely,
